page.title: 02GENERAL DESCRIPTION SEAMILL2
page.content: {The Teachers Centre}is in Seamill and overlooks the beach. It is a vantage point for getting a splendid view of {Arran}(known as the{mini Highlands). In the summer the beach is packed with locals and tourists. Seamill has a shop of its own called the Seamill Store or the Post Office. It is a small general store where all sorts of things can be bought from toilet rolls to sweets. It is open every day. D.A Kerr runs the shop. One can also buy stamps and can post letters. There is a house above the store and a house is being built to the right of it.{According to local {residents Seamill is a pleasant, well- {located place in which to live.
